game.name: Drifting Dots
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A minimalist physics roguelite where you create a mesmerizing cascade of droplets. Choose from three distinct modes and discover powerful upgrade synergies to master the flow. Calm, complex, and endlessly replayable.
